name: @thej@social.thej.in
note: Hacker, Maker, Blogger, Developer, Teacher, Public Interest Technologist @DataMeet & CTO @Peppo. I blog at ThejeshGN.com and this is my social microblog. Everything is Personal. Bangalore/India. +05:30, IST. He/His. Email.

content.html:
Weekly Notes 06/2023

News this week was very disturbing and heart-wrenching. One is from IIT Bombay, where a Dalit student committed suicide, and another is about Bangalore’s Jain university students’ very casteist mad ads play. All in the same week. How is it our educational institutions are failing so badly?

https://thejeshgn.com/2023/02/17/weekly-notes-07-2023/

content.html:
This Myntra is doing shady stuff, you order a product P1 and they will ship P2. Then when you try to return the product, since it doesn't match they refuse to take it back. You will try to do it many times, they keep refusing. After that deadline passes and you can't return.

MyntraSupport is useless and their support is horrible. I see many have faced the same issue.
content.value:
This Myntra is doing shady stuff, you order a product P1 and they will ship P2. Then when you try to return the product, since it doesn't match they refuse to take it back. You will try to do it many times, they keep refusing. After that deadline passes and you can't return.
MyntraSupport is useless and their support is horrible. I see many have faced the same issue.

content.html:
Communicating with Minetest Server Using APIs

I have been playing Minetest for a while now, mostly in creative mode. Recently I wanted to control it programmatically. So I started looking for ways to do it. I found mineysocket mod, which gives remote access to Minetest server over a network/socket API. There are wrappers available for various languages, including Python

https://thejeshgn.com/2023/02/14/communicating-with-minetest-server-using-apis/
content.value:
Communicating with Minetest Server Using APIs
I have been playing Minetest for a while now, mostly in creative mode. Recently I wanted to control it programmatically. So I started looking for ways to do it. I found mineysocket mod, which gives remote access to Minetest server over a network/socket API. There are wrappers available for various languages, including Python
https://thejeshgn.com/2023/02/14/communicating-with-minetest-server-using-apis/

content.html:
I'm off the wagon and back on the travel horse. The incredibly complicated 8-day March judicial trip for oral arguments has now been supplemented with 12 days in India in May.

Lecture at National Law School, hearing in Delhi High Court, first public meeting of the Servants of Knowledge, bunch of other stuff.

Been 3 years since in India last, likely to make 3 trips there this year. It is time to do this. Need to get serious again. Jai Gyan.
content.value: I'm off the wagon and back on the travel horse. The incredibly complicated 8-day March judicial trip for oral arguments has now been supplemented with 12 days in India in May. Lecture at National Law School, hearing in Delhi High Court, first public meeting of the Servants of Knowledge, bunch of other stuff. Been 3 years since in India last, likely to make 3 trips there this year. It is time to do this. Need to get serious again. Jai Gyan.

content.html:
Weekly Notes 06/2023

We sold the blue. It was my first car. We got it in Mar/2006, almost 17 years. I loved this blue WagonR, not just me, but my entire family and friends loved blue. We have very fond memories of it. Family trips, drives with Anju, drives with friends for their weddings, shiting inside the town and outside, first few all-night drives, long solo drives. All happened with blue. And it never complained. I did maintain it well. I am sure wherever blue goes; it will bring happiness and some adventure. I will miss blue.

https://thejeshgn.com/2023/02/10/weekly-notes-06-2023/

#weekly-notes

content.html:
ಕುವೆಂಪು, ರೈತನ ದೃಷ್ಟಿ

ಕರಿಯರದೊ ಬಿಳಿಯರದೊ ಯಾರದಾದರೆ ಏನು ಸಾಮ್ರಾಜ್ಯವಾವಗಂ ಸುಲಿಗೆ ರೈತರಿಗೆ ವಿಜಯನಗರವೊ ಮೊಗಲರಾಳ್ವಿಕೆಯೊ ಇಂಗ್ಲಿಷರೊ ಎಲ್ಲರೂ ಜಿಗಣೆಗಳೆ ನನ್ನ ನೆತ್ತರಿಗೆ ಕತ್ತಿ ಪರದೇಶಿಯಾದರೆ ಮಾತ್ರ ನೋವೆ ನಮ್ಮವರೆ ಹದಹಾಕಿ ತಿವಿದರದು ಹೂವೆ?

Why I like kuvempu so much? One example is this poem.

https://honalu.net/2021/02/02/%E0%B2%95%E0%B3%81%E0%B2%B5%E0%B3%86%E0%B2%82%E0%B2%AA%E0%B3%81-%E0%B2%95%E0%B2%B5%E0%B2%A8%E0%B2%97%E0%B2%B3-%E0%B2%93%E0%B2%A6%E0%B3%81-6%E0%B2%A8%E0%B3%86%E0%B2%AF-%E0%B2%95%E0%B2%82%E0%B2%A4/
content.value:
ಕುವೆಂಪು, ರೈತನ ದೃಷ್ಟಿ
ಕರಿಯರದೊ ಬಿಳಿಯರದೊ ಯಾರದಾದರೆ ಏನು
ಸಾಮ್ರಾಜ್ಯವಾವಗಂ ಸುಲಿಗೆ ರೈತರಿಗೆ
ವಿಜಯನಗರವೊ ಮೊಗಲರಾಳ್ವಿಕೆಯೊ ಇಂಗ್ಲಿಷರೊ
ಎಲ್ಲರೂ ಜಿಗಣೆಗಳೆ ನನ್ನ ನೆತ್ತರಿಗೆ
ಕತ್ತಿ ಪರದೇಶಿಯಾದರೆ ಮಾತ್ರ ನೋವೆ
ನಮ್ಮವರೆ ಹದಹಾಕಿ ತಿವಿದರದು ಹೂವೆ?
Why I like kuvempu so much? One example is this poem.
https://honalu.net/2021/02/02/%E0%B2%95%E0%B3%81%E0%B2%B5%E0%B3%86%E0%B2%82%E0%B2%AA%E0%B3%81-%E0%B2%95%E0%B2%B5%E0%B2%A8%E0%B2%97%E0%B2%B3-%E0%B2%93%E0%B2%A6%E0%B3%81-6%E0%B2%A8%E0%B3%86%E0%B2%AF-%E0%B2%95%E0%B2%82%E0%B2%A4/

Preparing my notes for both my Free Soft Wear talk at the #CreativeFreedomSummit and this episode of @fossandcrafts , I also wrote up two new patterns on my blog!

One is a is a simple layered skirt tutorial: https://mlemmer.org/blog/layered_skirt_tutorial/

content.html:
#introduction

I'm a comp-sci Ph.D. currently working on #MachineTranslation.

I am deeply interested in #cryptic #crosswords. I set under the pseudonym #Gussalufz. Site: https://gussalufz.com.

I also work on #OpenSource #crossword software.

#Exolve (https://exolve.app) is my software for interactively solving crosswords, and #Exet (https://exet.app) is my webapp for constructing crosswords (lots of extras for cryptic clues).

Also: #running, #beer, #wine, #TableTennis, #dogs.

content.html:
I look forward to seeing the completed PR for Gnome Software with the Open Source software only filter. 😁

It will be a big improvement brought by Gnome 44 and going back to promoting all the great Free Software available instead of the often insecure and buggy closed source alternatives. 💪

https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/gnome-software/-/merge_requests/1515

#gnome #gnome44 #opensource #freesoftware #foss #license #gnomesoftware

content.html:
The protesters are already having success. Keep up the pressure!

The specialized police unit that included at least some of the Memphis officers involved in the fatal beating of #TyreNichols was disbanded on Saturday as more protests took place in U.S. cities a day after harrowing video of the attack was released.

In a statement, the police department said it was permanently deactivating the SCORPION unit
https://www.reuters.com/world/us/memphis-disbands-police-unit-fatal-beating-more-protests-expected-2023-01-28/

content.html:
What's the point of being a democracy if you can't watch a documentary?

Universities which are expected to make students read and watch everything are suspending students. For what?

https://www.thenewsminute.com/article/rajasthan-central-university-suspends-ten-students-watching-bbc-documentary-172591

content.html: Remember these? Original Lytro! Lightfield cameras of the future! I grabbed a few off eBay some time ago and took a peek at the firmware. Found secret unlock that enables full remote control of all camera features. Full writeup here: https://github.com/ea/lytro_unlock
